usefulItems: deep-sided baking dish, bowl, wooden skewer, oven
title: Sweet potato, parsnip and broccoli frittata

ingredients.content: 100 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm)
200 g sweet potato, peeled and cut into pieces (3 cm)
1 parsnip (approx. 130 g), peeled and cut into pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 190°C. Grease a deep-sided baking dish (18 x 28 cm) and set aside.
Place Parmesan cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place sweet potato, broccoli and parsnip into mixing bowl and grate <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add eggs, mustard, salt, pepper, milk and reserved grated Parmesan and combine <b>30 sec//speed 3<b>. Transfer into prepared baking dish and bake for 35-45 minutes (190°C) or until a wooden skewer inserted into the centre of the frittata comes out clean. Cool slightly, then serve.

hintsAndTricks: For a complete meal, serve with a green salad.
